22g PROTEIN
Cheesecake

CLASSIC VANILLA BEAN CHEESECAKE

A timeless, creamy vanilla bean cheesecake with a protein-packed punch.

22g
Protein
180
Calories
60m
Total Time
12
Yield

Nutrition per 1 slice

Carbs15g
Fat7g
Fiber1g
Sugar6g
DifficultyMedium

INGREDIENTS

  • 240g cream cheese
  • 120g plain Greek yogurt
  • 60g vanilla whey protein
  • 2 large eggs
  • 1 tsp vanilla extract
  • 100g almond flour for crust

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Preheat Oven

Preheat your oven to 160¬∞C (325¬∞F).

2

Make Crust

Mix almond flour with a little melted butter and press into the bottom of a springform pan.

3

Mix Filling

In a large bowl, beat the cream cheese until smooth. Add the Greek yogurt, vanilla whey protein, eggs, and vanilla extract. Mix until just combined.

4

Pour and Bake

Pour the filling over the crust and bake for 45 minutes, or until the center is almost set.

5

Cool

Let the cheesecake cool completely in the oven with the door ajar. Then, refrigerate for at least 4 hours.

6

Serve

Slice and serve your delicious protein cheesecake.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
